description: Returns information about one or more pull request events.

parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID of the pull request. To get this ID, use  ListPullRequests.

nested_items.name: pullRequestEvents
nested_items.description: Information about the pull request events.

nested_items.name: pullRequestId
nested_items.description: The system-generated ID of the pull request.

nested_items.name: eventDate
nested_items.description: The day and time of the pull request event, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: pullRequestEventType
nested_items.description: The type of the pull request event (for example, a status change event (PULL_REQUEST_STATUS_CHANGED) or update event (PULL_REQUEST_SOURCE_REFERENCE_UPDATED)).

nested_items.name: actorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user whose actions resulted in the event. Examples include updating the pull request with more commits or changing the status of a pull request.

nested_items.name: pullRequestCreatedEventMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about the source and destination branches for the pull request.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository where the pull request was created.

nested_items.name: sourceCommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID on the source branch used when the pull request was created.

nested_items.name: destinationCommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID of the tip of the branch specified as the destination branch when the pull request was created.

nested_items.name: mergeBase
nested_items.description: The commit ID of the most recent commit that the source branch and the destination branch have in common.

nested_items.name: pullRequestStatusChangedEventMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about the change in status for the pull request event.

nested_items.name: pullRequestStatus
nested_items.description: The changed status of the pull request.

nested_items.name: pullRequestSourceReferenceUpdatedEventMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about the updated source branch for the pull request event.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository where the pull request was updated.

nested_items.name: beforeCommitId
nested_items.description: The full commit ID of the commit in the destination branch that was the tip of the branch at the time the pull request was updated.

nested_items.name: afterCommitId
nested_items.description: The full commit ID of the commit in the source branch that was the tip of the branch at the time the pull request was updated.

nested_items.name: mergeBase
nested_items.description: The commit ID of the most recent commit that the source branch and the destination branch have in common.

nested_items.name: pullRequestMergedStateChangedEventMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about the change in mergability state for the pull request event.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository where the pull request was created.

nested_items.name: destinationReference
nested_items.description: The name of the branch that the pull request is merged into.

nested_items.name: mergeMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about the merge state change event.

nested_items.name: isMerged
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the merge has been made.

nested_items.name: mergedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who merged the branches.

nested_items.name: mergeCommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID for the merge commit, if any.

nested_items.name: mergeOption
nested_items.description: The merge strategy used in the merge.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleEventMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about a pull request event.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the approval rule.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleId
nested_items.description: The system-generated ID of the approval rule.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleContent
nested_items.description: The content of the approval rule.

nested_items.name: approvalStateChangedEventMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about an approval state change for a pull request.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: The revision ID of the pull request when the approval state changed.

nested_items.name: approvalStatus
nested_items.description: The approval status for the pull request.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleOverriddenEventMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about an approval rule override event for a pull request.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: The revision ID of the pull request when the override event occurred.

nested_items.name: overrideStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the override event.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An enumeration token that can be used in a request to return the next batch of the results.
